bike.description: Monoque C-4 carbon with custom uni-directional carbon strands, Integrated aluminum cupped head tube, Double water bottle mounts.. Rear triangle: C-4 carbon  stays with shaped ride tuned Energy Transfer Chainstay, cold forged dropout with replaceable hanger and CNC Disc mount only option

components.description: NEW Rock Shox Recon SL Air, 80mm Travel w/ PopLoc Remote
NEW Shimano Deore LX HollowTech II, 22/32/44T Alloy Outer Ring
NEW Shimano Deore-XT Shadow, Top Normal
Shimano Deore LX Hydraulic Disc w/160mm Centerlock rotor
Ritchey Logic Zero Comp 1 1/8" Press Fit Integrated, 30mm spacers
Fuji Pro forged Alloy micro adjust, 350mm
